[TARGETLANGUAGE] Please write in english
[PROMPT]
Remove line breaks, any unneeded punctuation, and repetition from the following transcript. Include the revised transcript, labeled "Video transcript". Place this revised "transcript" after the "summary" described below. 

Summarize the "video transcript" in a short summary paragraph followed by a bullet point list to highlight the "Key Points". Do not refer to "the speaker". Instead, write from the first person directly to the reader.

Separate the first sentence of the summary paragraphy from the rest of the paragraph with a line break and include the text "INSERT VIDEO" on a line between the first and following sentences.

Address the reader directly with phrases like "your" website. 
Begin the first sentence of the summary with "The video below describes...".

In the next section labeled "blog post" create a blog post from the Video Transcript. 
Use bold text for title of the blog and h2 format for subheadings.

Include a section labeled blog post details after the title of the blog and before the text of the blog. Include a meta description with fewer than 150 characters.
